content: Stream created by Max Grover.
Hey ya'll - figured it would be helpful to have a stream to chat about outreach activities!!
Kevin says Tuesday morning (before 1 pm EDT) works for him, and we seemed to settle on a preference for 9 am MDT / 11 am EDT
@Julia Kent as our calendar event owner, can you reschedule our meeting to next Tuesday at 9 am MDT if that works for everyone?
Just did! I rescheduled all following events too, let me know if we want to change it moving forward.
Per John's discussion, do we want to consider some sort of AMS abstract (due Wed Sep 1)?
